General.Name: Jiangxi Hengda Hi-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Hengda Hi-Tech Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells anti-wear, and anti-corrosion materials for industrial equipment in China. The company offers acoustic noise reduction, environmental protection, garbage furnace, anti-corrosion equipment, waste heat and photovoltaic power generation, internet, and other services. It is also involved in the internet advertising services, including software marketing, game promotion, page advertising, and other businesses. In addition, the company provides technical engineering services to anti-wear, and anti-corrosion materials. Its products are used in power, steel, cement, petrochemical, subway, airport, gymnasium, and other industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanchang, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 88, Jinlu North Road, Nanchang, China, 330096
